means: 恩格斯(1820-1895，德国社会主义哲学家，科学共产主义奠基人之一)

sentence.Network_en: Marx wrote back to say that Engels'praise had greatly encouraged him.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克思回信给恩格斯说,他的赞誉对自己的鼓励很大.

sentence.Network_en: Marx and Engels scientifically forecast the collapse of capitalism.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克思和恩格斯科学地预言了资本主义的灭亡.

sentence.Network_en: If she knew German, she would read Marx and Engels in German.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果她懂德语, 她就会读德文版的马恩著作了.
